text: Adam Chrzanowski (born 31 March 1999) is a Polish professional footballer who plays as a defender for Italian Serie B club Pordenone. ==Club career== On 13 March 2020 he signed a contract with Italian club Pordenone which became active in July 2020. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1999 births Category:Footballers from Warsaw Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Poland youth international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Znicz Pruszków players Category:Lechia Gdańsk players Category:Pordenone Calcio players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Italy
title: Adam Chrzanowski
